SOAP-ENV:Fault.faultstring: BPCOR-6135: A fault was not handled in the process scope; Fault Name is {http://rs.udc.es/telco}TelcoException; Fault Data is <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><jbi:message xmlns:msgns="http://rs.udc.es/telco" name="TelcoException" type="msgns:TelcoException" version="1.0" xmlns:jbi="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/jbi/wsdl-11-wrapper"><jbi:part><ns2:TelcoException xmlns:ns2="http://rs.udc.es/telco" xmlns:ns4="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope">Cannot obtain calls to bill for customer "null"</ns2:TelcoException></jbi:part></jbi:message>.
